data.oai_dc:dc: Diffusion MRI data from a physical phantom with three orthogonal fiber directions. Data was acquired at 9.4T.

This zip file contains raw dMRI data in a matlab (.mat) file (phantom_data), corresponding b-values (effective_b), gradient table (DWI_encoding_directions), and structural scan (structural_data). The data is also included as dicom and nifti.
